document.full_text: derek boogaard, an enforcer signed last season by the rangers, was found dead in his minnesota apartment. his family authorized boston university researchers to examine his brain for damage.
document.title: boogaard family authorizes brain study
lines_and_colors: derek boogaard, an enforcer signed last season by the rangers, was found dead in his minnesota apartment. his family authorized boston university researchers to examine his brain for damage.
